content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Server & Workload Protection Agent deployment script now available July 16, 2024—Endpoint Security now supports deploying the Server & Workload Protection Agent to your endpoints using a deployment script. You can download the script from Endpoint Inventory. For more information, see Run the deployment script. Endpoint Security → Endpoint Inventory © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Server & Workload Protection Agent deployment script now available
